subject: Re: [LH] Kate is everywhere
body:
d~  wrote:

> If it's not the 'gaffer' vs 'gaffa' debate, we have to witness the
> 'duck' vs 'duct' debate!?!

> puh-lease!

There's no "debate" here -- there are those here who are *right* and
those here who are *wrong*.  From the Oxford English Dictionary:

     gaffer tape (also gaffa tape, gaffer's tape) [after use of the tape
     by electricians for holding electrical cables securely in place], a
     strong, cloth-backed, waterproof, adhesive tape (cf. *duck tape
     s.v. DUCK n.3, *duct tape s.v. DUCT n.).

|>oug
